SetViewLayout.short_help: Sets the current view layout from a table
SetViewLayout.description: Args:  table describing the view layout

GetViewLayout.description: Returns a table describing the current view layout

GetControlViewList.short_help: Returns the list of views from the Controls tabs
GetControlViewList.description: where 'table' is a table of the FuView objects in the Controls view tabs,and entries are named by the view's ID string.

SwitchMainView.short_help: Displays a given view from the Main tabs
SwitchMainView.description:
where 'id' is the ID of one of the views in the Main tab list.
e.g. 'FlowView', 'ConsoleView', 'TimelineView', 'SplineEditorView'

SwitchControlView.short_help: Displays a given view from the Control tabs
SwitchControlView.description:
where 'id' is the ID of one of the views in the Controls tab list.
e.g. 'ControlView', 'ModifierView'

GetMainViewList.short_help: Returns the list of views from the Main tabs
GetMainViewList.description: where 'views' is a table of the FuView objects in the Main view tabs,and entries are named by the view's ID string.
